chunks.zh: 家人在快手被骗，挽回损失太难了
chunks.en: My family was scammed on Kwai (Kuaishou), and it's too difficult to recover the losses.

chunks.zh:
1:家里老人 23 ，24 两年在快手消费了 10 个 W ，买的大部分是“古董”，小部分保健品。
2:发现已经对快手上的主播剧情类直播深信不疑，说什么信什么，从而陷入了大家族古董暂时保管骗局，老物件回收骗局，古董拍卖骗局。
3:报案，叔叔说收到货就是交易纠纷，建议起诉。
4:快手只把有保证金的给退回了，还有 75%的商家保证金没了需要我们自己联系，基本上都联系不上。
5:根据营业执照投诉到市场监管部门，商家要么联系不上，要么就说没钱赔,市场监管局也是建议起诉。
6:订单太过分散，三百多个订单，主播们每播两场就换个店铺，每家店铺金额都不高，起诉太麻烦。
7:主播账号也是三天一换，举报了，就换个号，系统推荐机制还会把他推给粉丝，甚至未雨绸缪，还没封的时候就已经给小号引流。
8:此时此刻这帮人还在直播还在带货，一部分在快手，一部分已经引流到微信，举报到微信也是石沉大海，一点不影响每天直播收割这群老年人。
9:据我观察相同的受害者有数十万之多，央视也报道过，不知道为啥就是没人管。
chunks.en:
1: The elderly in my family spent 100,000 RMB on Kwai in the past two years (2023 and 2024), mostly buying 'antiques' and a small portion of health products.
2: I discovered that they deeply believe in the scripted live broadcasts of the anchors on Kwai, believing everything they say, and thus falling into scams such as the temporary custody of antiques by large families, the recycling of old objects, and the auction of antiques.
3: I reported the case, and my uncle said that receiving the goods constitutes a transaction dispute, and suggested filing a lawsuit.
4: Kwai only refunded the deposits that had guarantees. 75% of the merchants' deposits are gone, and we need to contact them ourselves. Basically, we can't get in touch with them.
5: According to the business license, I complained to the market supervision department. The merchants either can't be contacted or say they have no money to compensate. The market supervision bureau also suggested filing a lawsuit.
6: The orders are too scattered, more than 300 orders. The anchors change shops every two broadcasts, and the amount of money in each shop is not high, making it too troublesome to file a lawsuit.
7: The anchor accounts also change every three days. If they are reported, they just change their accounts. The system recommendation mechanism will still push them to fans, and even prepare in advance, diverting traffic to small accounts before they are banned.
8: At this moment, these people are still broadcasting and selling goods, some on Kwai, and some have been diverted to WeChat. Reporting to WeChat is also like a stone sinking into the sea, and it doesn't affect their daily live broadcast harvesting of these elderly people at all.
9: According to my observation, there are hundreds of thousands of similar victims. CCTV has also reported it, but I don't know why no one cares.

chunks.zh: 还不是怪你，你要是在家里啃老，他们哪还会有钱被别人骗。
chunks.en: It's all your fault. If you were leeching off your parents at home, they wouldn't have money to be scammed by others.

chunks.zh: @hallostr  反思什么？ 我去上班了，家里老人有点生活费有闲暇时间，家人自己在家看个短视频，买了东西，被主播教唆把东西藏好，会有坏人来抢。要我反思什么 ？ 不要给老人留钱？ 别上班天天陪着家人？ 不让在正规平台看短视频？ 你们这些反思怪怎么对普通人要求这么高？
chunks.en: @hallostr What is there to reflect on? I went to work. The elderly in my family have some living expenses and free time. My family watched a short video at home, bought something, and were instigated by the anchor to hide the things because bad people would come to steal them. What should I reflect on? Don't leave money for the elderly? Don't go to work and stay with my family every day? Don't let them watch short videos on legitimate platforms? Why are you reflection monsters so demanding of ordinary people?

chunks.zh: 最近闲鱼有一批假货硬盘，普遍都是女头像 2T4T6T 硬盘 100-160 的卖价，我都连续举报下架 100 多个了。像这种专门用海量账号玩的，你都没法抓到源头假货厂家去举报
chunks.en: Recently, there has been a batch of fake hard drives on Xianyu, mostly female avatars, 2T, 4T, and 6T hard drives selling for 100-160 RMB. I have reported and removed more than 100 of them in a row. For this kind of thing that is specifically played with massive accounts, you can't catch the source fake manufacturers to report.

chunks.zh: @hallostr #20 op 家里老人被骗了，心情糟糕来和大伙一吐为快你这冷不丁冒一句怎么不反思一下，真挺难绷的 :-|
chunks.en: @hallostr #20 OP's family's elderly were scammed, and they are in a bad mood and want to vent to everyone. You suddenly said why not reflect on it, which is really hard to hold back :-|

chunks.zh: 认真看了每个字，没看到一个字是关于自己/老人的反思
chunks.en: I read every word carefully and didn't see a single word about self/elderly reflection.

chunks.zh: @hallostr #20  果然打的标签不会标错人
chunks.en: @hallostr #20 Sure enough, the tag was not assigned to the wrong person.

chunks.zh: @hallostr 不是在造谣就是在当反思怪.https://www.v2ex.com/t/1113620
chunks.en: @hallostr Either spreading rumors or being a reflection monster. https://www.v2ex.com/t/1113620

chunks.zh: 不光老人，还有很多年轻人买画的被骗， 抖音上 那个“爱画画的子衿”，每次都用软件把照片 ps 上油画滤镜，线稿也是用软件抠出来的，然后反向做假装手绘的过程，但面部细节突然就和照片一样了，面部的绘画过程从来都不会有，脸部定位和照片完美重合(偶尔摆出来的照片是另一张)，没有照片他永远画不出来那么精准的脸部。店铺里订画的都大几万人了。。。
chunks.en: It's not just the elderly, there are also many young people who are scammed when buying paintings. The 'Zi Jin who loves to draw' on Douyin uses software to Photoshop oil painting filters on photos every time. The line drafts are also extracted with software, and then the process of pretending to be hand-painted is reversed, but the facial details suddenly become the same as the photo. There is never any facial painting process, the face positioning perfectly coincides with the photo (occasionally the photo shown is another one). Without the photo, he would never be able to draw such a precise face. Tens of thousands of people have ordered paintings in the shop...

chunks.zh: @CodeGou 那你就不反思呗，前事不忘后事之师，虽然对方多么多么的坏，但最后是你自己要承担代价，无关于责任我就说网上不能好心，有的人根本听不进劝啊合着就会恶意揣度别人的好意，害不说了反过来还说别人反思怪，真是一点顺着他的意思就开始人身攻击了
chunks.en: @CodeGou Then you don't reflect, remembering the past is a guide to the future. Although the other party is so bad, in the end you have to bear the cost yourself. Regardless of responsibility, I said you can't be kind online, some people just don't listen to advice and maliciously speculate about the good intentions of others. It's harmful, and instead they say others are reflection monsters, and as soon as you go along with their idea, they start attacking you personally.

chunks.zh: Linux do 发一遍，V2 又发一遍🤙
chunks.en: Posted on Linux do once, and then on V2 again 🤙

chunks.zh: 建议带老人上《听泉鉴宝》栏目
chunks.en: I suggest taking the elderly to the 'Listening to Spring Appraising Treasures' program.

chunks.zh: 人家交了保护费的 真的 很多人可以创收
chunks.en: They paid the protection fee. Really, many people can generate revenue.

chunks.zh: 我是不敢让老人手里留钱的,银行卡里的钱全部收走,每个月发现金当生活费
chunks.en: I don't dare to leave money in the hands of the elderly. I take all the money in their bank cards and give them cash as living expenses every month.

chunks.zh: @julyclyde  都这个觉悟，骗子团伙要乐开花了。
chunks.en: @julyclyde With this awareness, the scam gang will be laughing their heads off.

chunks.zh: 不要给老人太多钱。换句话说，“诈骗”就是让不符合智商的钱重新分配，上一辈人的认知无法掌控这么多的钱。每个月给他一点零钱，打电话给顺丰禁止发到付件；微信支付宝各开一点亲密付。
chunks.en: Don't give the elderly too much money. In other words, 'fraud' is the redistribution of money that does not match intelligence. The older generation's cognition cannot control so much money. Give him a little pocket money every month, call SF Express to prohibit sending cash on delivery; open a little intimate payment on WeChat and Alipay.

chunks.zh: 老人被骗这个问题很难搞。现在是快手，以前没快手的时候，线下搞各种保健品营销，不都是骗吗？但是这种可能很难管，它又不是不给东西，它只是价格贵，难道还能禁止东西贵？能想到的唯一办法就是尽量盯着点，和父母好好沟通，如果可以把他们的钱看起来，甚至哪怕买个什么真正保值的大件套牢。
chunks.en: The problem of the elderly being scammed is very difficult to deal with. Now it's Kwai, but before Kwai, weren't all kinds of offline health product marketing scams? But this may be difficult to manage, it's not like they don't give things, it's just that the price is expensive, can you prohibit things from being expensive? The only way I can think of is to try to keep an eye on it, communicate well with parents, and if possible, look after their money, or even buy something really valuable to lock them in.

chunks.zh: @ffxxzz  没用，太原老葛知道么，这个就是人尽皆知的骗子，卖假金标，复活项链，现在俨然一副快手一哥。而且相关骗局央视都报道过了，新闻里损失几十万的受害者也是最后被踢皮球到自己联系商家。 快手完美隐身。  快手就是卖家卖货，平台抽成，消费者维权，平台扣保证金，商家没有保证金，商家消费者你们自己处理吧，平台不承担任何责任。
chunks.en: @ffxxzz It's useless. Do you know Lao Ge from Taiyuan? He is a well-known scammer, selling fake gold labels and resurrection necklaces, and now he looks like the top brother on Kwai. Moreover, CCTV has already reported on related scams, and the victims in the news who lost hundreds of thousands of yuan were also eventually kicked back to contact the merchants themselves. Kwai is perfectly hidden. Kwai is just a platform where sellers sell goods, the platform takes commissions, consumers defend their rights, the platform deducts deposits, and if the merchants have no deposits, the platform says that the merchants and consumers should handle it themselves, and the platform does not bear any responsibility.

chunks.zh: 自己家的老人自己管，不要指着叔叔管正府管，为入民服务只是个口号，真能实现就不用天天喊了。也不要寄希望于骗子从世界上消失，羊还希望狼灭绝呢，但这个世界并不以你的希望来构建，成年人应该具有成熟些的认知。
chunks.en: Take care of the elderly in your own family. Don't rely on your uncle to take care of the government. Serving the people is just a slogan. If it could really be achieved, there would be no need to shout it every day. Don't expect scammers to disappear from the world. Sheep also hope that wolves will be extinct, but this world is not built on your hopes. Adults should have more mature cognition.

chunks.zh: 1. 号已废，给老人换手机号2. 手机 APP 取消绑定银行卡，只给现金，让去线下买，虽然贵一点，总比被骗了好3. 微信/支付宝绑定亲情付，不要绑定老人卡，每月限额，超过支付失败4. 大额支出由你来亲自付款，
chunks.en: 1. The account is useless, change the elderly's mobile phone number. 2. Unbind the bank card from the mobile app, only give cash, and let them go to the offline store to buy, although it's a bit more expensive, it's better than being scammed. 3. Bind WeChat/Alipay with Family Payment, don't bind the elderly's card, set a monthly limit, and payment will fail if it exceeds the limit. 4. You personally pay for large expenses.

chunks.zh: 改变不了环境只能改变自己。老人被骗自己还理直气壮，有点无语
chunks.en: If you can't change the environment, you can only change yourself. It's a bit speechless that the elderly are still justified after being scammed.
